snippet: The family of Mr. Gray, who died from injuries he sustained in police custody, will receive $6.4 million under a settlement approved by the city.
abstract: Baltimore Mayor Stephanie Rawlings-Blake announces city's approval of $6.4 million legal settlement with family of Freddie Gray, black man whose death while in police custody set off widespread rioting and led to criminal charges against six Baltimore police officers.
lead_paragraph: The family of Mr. Gray, who died from injuries he sustained in police custody, will receive $6.4 million under a settlement approved by the city.

headline.main: Freddie Gray Settlement Approved by Baltimore Officials
headline.print_headline: Baltimore Makes Settlement With the Gray Family Official
